Posts.Content: Jan 12, 2017 03:46PM Sanai wrote: Hi! I'm also having neck and shoulder pain since Nov 2016. I had to go back to my chiropractor last December.He did adjustments on my neck and it really helped.I had massage afterwards.I did these 2x a week for 3 weeks. Right now, the pain lessened but I'm still worried that it's something else.
